text: Eduardo Matarazzo Suplicy (born June 21, 1941) is a Brazilian left-wing politician, economist and professor. He is one of the founders and main political figures on the Workers Party of Brazil (PT). He was born in S達o Paulo. In 2017, he was elected to the city council of S達o Paulo. He held that office before between 1989 to 1990. Suplicy was elected State Deputy of S達o Paulo in 1979. In 1983, he became a member of the Chamber of Deputies. Leaving office in 1987, he became a Senator in 1991. He left the Senate in 2015. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from S達o Paulo Category:Brazilian economists Category:Brazilian educators Category:Workers' Party (Brazil) politicians
title: Eduardo Suplicy
